title: Our Sun
description: The Sun is essential for life on Earth. In the book Our Sun, students will learn about the Sun's energy and how it helps people, plants, and other animals survive. Detailed photographs, repetitive sentence patterns, and high-frequency words support early readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea of a text and the proper use of commas after introductory words.
